title: Cron Step Configuration
description: Scheduled cron job that runs every 5 minutes to check for scheduled campaigns and trigger them when ready.

title: Scheduled Campaign Processing
description: Retrieves all scheduled campaigns from state and checks if they're ready to be sent based on scheduled time.

title: Campaign Trigger Logic
description: Triggers scheduled campaigns by emitting 'content-personalized' event and updating campaign status to prevent duplicates.

title: Campaign Cleanup
description: Cleans up old triggered campaigns and removes completed campaigns older than 24 hours to maintain state hygiene.

title: Campaign Status Management
description: Updates main campaign status and handles failed campaigns with proper error tracking and state management.
